definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: Job (meaning unknown; Thes √ [[איב]]; obj. of enmity, cf. for pass. sense [[יִלּוֹד]]; Ew comp. Ar. 0’aw=abun he who turns (to God); but cf. Di on 1:1; all dub. cf. Lag:BN 90) Job 1:1, Job 1:5, Job 1:5, Job 1:5, Job 1:8, Job 1:9, Job 1:14 + 48 t. Jb; Ez Eze 14:14, Eze 14:20.
